statements: SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data
SELECT id, latitude, longitude, altitude FROM satellite_tracking_data
SELECT satellite_id, tracking_date FROM satellite_tracking_data ORDER BY tracking_date DESC
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id = 3
SELECT id, tracking_date, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE altitude > 10000
SELECT id, satellite_id, tracking_date, latitude, longitude, altitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE satellite_id = 1 ORDER BY tracking_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE altitude > 5000 AND tracking_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY latitude ASC, longitude DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90 AND longitude BETWEEN -180 AND 180 ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT id, satellite_id, altitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE tracking_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY altitude DESC LIMIT 15;
SELECT satellite_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM satellite_tracking_data GROUP BY satellite_id HAVING total_records > 100 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_metadata
SELECT satellite_id, satellite_name, launch_date FROM satellite_metadata
SELECT satellite_id, status FROM satellite_metadata WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_positions
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_positions ORDER BY latitude ASC
SELECT * FROM satellite_positions WHERE latitude > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, satellite_id, timestamp, longitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE satellite_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT satellite_name, launch_date, status FROM satellite_metadata WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_positions WHERE longitude < -90 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2024-01-01';
SELECT * FROM satellite_metadata WHERE satellite_name LIKE '%Satellite%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE altitude > 10000;
SELECT team_name, number_of_members FROM satellite_teams ORDER BY number_of_members DESC;
SELECT * FROM satellite_status WHERE battery_level < 20 ORDER BY last_communication DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM satellite_teams WHERE team_name LIKE 'Mission%';
SELECT * FROM satellite_tracking_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT satellite_id, latitude, longitude FROM satellite_tracking_data WHERE altitude > 10000;
SELECT * FROM satellite_status WHERE battery_level < 30 ORDER BY last_communication ASC;
SELECT team_name, number_of_members FROM satellite_teams WHERE team_lead = 'John Doe';

SELECT satellite_tracking_data.satellite_id, satellite_status.status, satellite_status.is_active FROM satellite_tracking_data JOIN satellite_status ON satellite_tracking_data.satellite_id = satellite_status.satellite_id;
SELECT * FROM Satellite WHERE satellite_id = 1;
SELECT name, launch_date FROM Satellite ORDER BY launch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrackingData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT GroundStation.name, DataAnalysis.analysis_result FROM GroundStation INNER JOIN DataAnalysis ON GroundStation.station_id = DataAnalysis.station_id;

SELECT Satellite.name, TrackingData.timestamp, GroundStation.location FROM Satellite JOIN TrackingData ON Satellite.satellite_id = TrackingData.satellite_id JOIN GroundStation ON DataAnalysis.station_id = GroundStation.station_id;
SELECT * FROM Satellite ORDER BY launch_date DESC, name ASC;
SELECT tracking_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM TrackingData WHERE elevation > 10000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT station_id, name, location FROM GroundStation WHERE name LIKE 'G%' AND location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT a.analysis_id, a.analysis_result, t.timestamp FROM DataAnalysis a JOIN TrackingData t ON a.tracking_id = t.tracking_id WHERE t.latitude > 40 AND t.longitude < -100 ORDER BY t.timestamp;

SELECT s.name AS satellite_name, g.name AS station_name, d.analysis_result FROM Satellite s JOIN DataAnalysis d ON s.satellite_id = d.tracking_id JOIN GroundStation g ON d.station_id = g.station_id WHERE d.analysis_result LIKE '%success%' ORDER BY satellite_name, station_name;
SELECT * FROM TrackingStation;
SELECT id, name, location FROM TrackingStation;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM TrackingStation;
SELECT * FROM TrackingStation WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, name FROM TrackingStation ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM TrackingStation;
SELECT name, location FROM TrackingStation WHERE capacity > 100 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, name, capacity FROM TrackingStation WHERE location = 'Houston';
SELECT * FROM TrackingStation ORDER BY capacity DESC, name ASC;
SELECT name, location, capacity FROM TrackingStation WHERE name LIKE '%Center%' AND capacity BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
